node.title: Former person of interest in Willam Tyrrell case says new search brought back painful memories
node.alt: A young boy is smiling in a red t-shirt.
node.description: The pensioner says he was "humiliated" by detectives investigating the disappearance of William Tyrrell and is considering suing police over his treatment.
node.content:
["As police scoured the rainwater tank below William Tyrrell's late foster-grandmother's home, Paul Savage poured himself a cup of tea and began watching an afternoon movie on TV.", "Mr Savage, who lives near the home at Kendall, on the NSW Mid-North Coast, says he is pleased to see officers looking for the boy, who has been missing for seven years.", "But he admits it brings up painful memories of when he was named a person of interest by former lead detective Gary Jubelin.", "The elderly widower was eventually cleared.", "\"I can't imagine what my life may have looked like without police calling me a person of interest, but I can tell you it was awful, and not right, for them to do that \u2014\u00a0it made me look like a suspect, without any evidence,\" he said.", "", "
Paul Savage was cleared after being named a person of interest.(AAP: Peter Lorimer)
", "\"I was humiliated, having my personal life out there.", "\"I really hope they find the little fella, it's not right \u2014\u00a0I hope there is some end to this soon, especially for his family.\"", "For years, Jubelin \u2014\u00a0the former lead detective on the case \u2014\u00a0relentlessly pursued Mr Savage", "It included having his home bugged.", "\"The way he treated me was deplorable \u2014\u00a0I still can't quite believe it,\" Mr Savage said.", "Jubelin was eventually stood down and fined for illegally recording three conversations with the Kendall resident in May and December 2018.", "He later resigned from the force.", "When Jubelin was convicted last year, magistrate Ross Hudson said the former police officer belittled and humiliated Mr Savage despite there being no evidence of his involvement in William's disappearance.", "", "
The search for William Tyyrell's remains is expected to continue for weeks.(ABC News: Mark Reddie)
", "\"There's no DNA, there's no fingerprints ... there's no leads, there's nothing. He picked Mr Savage ... pursuing him at all costs,\" he said.", "There have been about 1,000 persons of interest in the investigation over the past seven years.", "Few were thrust into public spotlight as much as Mr Savage\u00a0and a local washing machine repairman, who is now suing NSW Police for damaging his reputation.", "\"I don't have many words for Gary, I don't ever want to hear from him again,\" Mr Savage\u00a0said.", "\"The problem is,\u00a0you need money to take people to court,\u00a0and I wasn't left with much after the coronial inquest. But I am considering suing.\"", "", "
Gary Jubelin\u00a0relentlessly pursued Mr Savage for years.(AAP: Bianca De Marchi)
", "The search for William's remains resumed last week after police said they had received new information.", "The ABC understands the boy's foster-mother is a person of interest, however, she denies any involvement in his disappearance.", "At the coronial inquest in 2019, Mr Savage said he searched bushland surrounding Benaroon Drive for about an hour on the day William went missing in September 2014.", "\"I was only trying to help find the little fella that day, but I don't go for bushwalks anymore \u2014\u00a0I just tend to keep to myself these days,\" he said.", "Despite having his name, address and personal life splashed over the news for several years, Mr Savage said it hadn't damaged his reputation among the Kendall community.", "", "
The search for William Tyrrell's remains has been hampered by bad weather this week.(ABC News: Emma Siossian)
", "\"People here have been very supportive of me \u2014\u00a0I haven't had any negative things happen to me \u2014\u00a0I still see my friends and I am just trying to enjoy what's left of my life,\" he said.", "NSW Police Commissioner Mick Fuller last week criticised the early stages of the investigation into William's disappearance, saying too much time was \"wasted\" on \"some persons of interest\".", "Jubelin hit back later in the week, saying he had interrogated the boy's foster-parents and placed a listening device in their car before ruling them out as suspects.\u00a0", "He told Nine radio his officers had \"investigated every theory\".", "Police failed to find any sign of William Tyrrell after searching a rainwater and septic tank below the balcony of his late foster-grandmother's home yesterday.", "It was the place William was last seen.", "Mr Savage emerged from his balcony as the search wrapped up before returning to the couch to continue watching his movie.", "\"It is about a five-year-old girl who ran away from her family,\" he said."]
